greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle with n-th row polynomial equal to Product_{k = 1..n} (x + n + k).
comment: The row polynomials are a Sheffer sequence. For the associated polynomial sequence of binomial type see A038455.
link: R. Sprugnoli, An Introduction to Mathematical Methods in Combinatorics, Section 5.6 CreateSpace Independent Publishing Platform 2006, ISBN-13: 978-1502925244
maple: seq(seq(coeff(product(n + x + k, k = 1 .. n), x, i), i = 0..n), n = 0..8);
results.author: _Peter Bala_, Nov 05 2015
